headline: Better Enterprise Software Stock: ServiceNow vs. Salesforce
summary: Can Salesforce's AI-driven future outpace ServiceNow's equally AI-powered hypergrowth? One of these software giants walks away with the "better buy now" trophy, and it's not a close race.

raw.headline: Better Enterprise Software Stock: ServiceNow vs. Salesforce
